txt.en: Despite the failure of the Iron Garrison, the dwarves will not allow the Orcs of Khazad-dûm to spill forth into Azanulbizar, the Dimrill Dale.\n\nYour mission is to defeat the Pûlpum gate-captain and Orcs camped at the East-gate of Moria.
Despite the failure of the Iron Garrison, the dwarves will not allow the Orcs of Khazad-dûm to spill forth into Azanulbizar, the Dimrill Dale.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath at Akrâz-zahar.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'Our scouts in the Dimrill Dale have sighted another band of Orcs rallying outside the East-gate. It seems that the few remaining Orcs of Mazog's clan of old, the Pûlpum, now lead them. The evils of Azog and his foul offspring haunt us at every step! This cannot stand!

'You are to travel to the Dimrill Dale at once and defeat the Pûlpum leading the Orcs at the East-gate. For the Kharum-ubnâr!'
You must find a way to breach a barrier to reach your mission objective.
Your mission is to defeat the Pûlpum gate-captain and Orcs camped at the East-gate of Moria.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath and travel to the Dimrill Dale.
'You have done well, [placeholder]!\n\n'May those Orcs who still cling to their loyalties of old, be it that of Azog, Bolg, or even Mazog and Gorgar, know that their time is at an end!'
